channel.title: Christmas cracker animation
channel.description: any way to make a flash when you pull a christmas cracker iwth someone :)

item.title: Christmas cracker animation
item.dc:creator: @LeScape_Pk LeScape Pk
item.description:
@LeScape_Pk wrote:

try adding this

stillgfx(480, absY, absX);
p2.stillgfx(480, absY, absX);

make sure u have this

[code]
if you want it pimp, make this

stillgfx(480, absY, absX);
stillgfx(480, absY+1, absX);
stillgfx(480, absY-1, absX);
stillgfx(480, absY+1, absX+1);
stillgfx(480, absY+1 absX-1);
stillgfx(480, absY-1, absX+1);
stillgfx(480, absY-1, absX-1);
stillgfx(480, absY, absX+1);
stillgfx(480, absY, absX-1);
p2.stillgfx(480, absY, absX);
p2.stillgfx(480, absY+1, absX);
p2.stillgfx(480, absY-1, absX);
p2.stillgfx(480, absY+1, absX+1);
p2.stillgfx(480, absY+1 absX-1);
p2.stillgfx(480, absY-1, absX+1);
p2.stillgfx(480, absY-1, absX-1);
p2.stillgfx(480, absY, absX+1);
p2.stillgfx(480, absY, absX-1);

closest to flash i could find[/code]

Read full topic
